2fa303dd1c71897e139e1daa007ed46d.name: The Sacrifice: Update 23.2.0
2fa303dd1c71897e139e1daa007ed46d.fixes: Fixed inability to place Komi stones in The Sacrifice quest if Jump and Move Up/Afterburner are bound to a different button when using a controller.

2fa303dd1c71897e139e1daa007ed46d.name: Shrine of the Eidolon: Update 22.16.0
2fa303dd1c71897e139e1daa007ed46d.changes: You can now shoot while initiating Afterburner in Sky Archwing.

2fa303dd1c71897e139e1daa007ed46d.name: Specters of the Rail: Update 2
2fa303dd1c71897e139e1daa007ed46d.fixes: Fixed players no longer being able to perform the "slide attack" motion to execute a unique melee in Archwing missions. You can now only do a slide attack when Afterburner mode is enabled.

2fa303dd1c71897e139e1daa007ed46d.name: Hotfix 17.5.3
2fa303dd1c71897e139e1daa007ed46d.changes: Archwing Afterburner speed increased by 2x (default Spacebar to activate).

2fa303dd1c71897e139e1daa007ed46d.name: Update 17.5: The Jordas Precept. + Hotfix 17.5.1
2fa303dd1c71897e139e1daa007ed46d.additions: Afterburner: Pressing the ‘jump’ button while boosting will cause the Archwing afterburners to kick in, giving players a significant speed increase.

abea9ffa55135366c2222314a26b28ed.name: Fortuna: Hotfix 24.2.8
abea9ffa55135366c2222314a26b28ed.fixes: Fixed Ammo Chain Mod description displaying "AMMO MAXIMUM" all in capital letters.

abea9ffa55135366c2222314a26b28ed.name: Fortuna: Hotfix 24.2.7 + 24.2.7.1
abea9ffa55135366c2222314a26b28ed.fixes: Fixed the Ammo max increase from the Arch-Gun Ammo Chain Mod applying to your primary weapon.

17f391d27abceeddf0687c42b5de7cce.name: The Sacrifice: Update 23
17f391d27abceeddf0687c42b5de7cce.fixes: Fixed kill scan mechanic (Synoid Heliocor, Astral Autopsy Mod) not functioning.

e4de4400c78ef04285cfbfebb6eb273e.name: Recurring Dreams + Hotfix 1
e4de4400c78ef04285cfbfebb6eb273e.additions: Meteor Crash, Nebula Bore, and Astral Slash have been added to the Codex.

e4de4400c78ef04285cfbfebb6eb273e.name: Specters of the Rail: U2.1
e4de4400c78ef04285cfbfebb6eb273e.fixes: Fixed Archwing Impact, Slash, and Puncture Mods giving incorrect bonuses to stats. They were giving flat bonus rather than percentages as intended by the precedent set by all other physical damage mods  (Comet Blast, Quasar Drill, Zodiac Shred, Meteor Crash, Nebula Bore, and Astral Slash are all +90%).

72fe3e937470224504a779ef0fe3dd07.name: Update: Specters of the Rail
72fe3e937470224504a779ef0fe3dd07.changes: Increased the drop rate of Automatic Trigger.

d393b6123972847403f0273e1b9eda76.name: Update 15.7.2 + 15.7.2.1
d393b6123972847403f0273e1b9eda76.changes: Buffed effect of Auxiliary Power’s Mod.

a354fcc3fc69dc3bff51efc9ef77bbc1.name: The Silver Grove
a354fcc3fc69dc3bff51efc9ef77bbc1.fixes: Fixed the Cold Snap Mod having no effect if a Client has it equipped.

6b35c7839aadea0757354f7bd1e47452.name: Specters of the Rail: U2.1
6b35c7839aadea0757354f7bd1e47452.fixes: Fixed Archwing Impact, Slash, and Puncture Mods giving incorrect bonuses to stats. They were giving flat bonus rather than percentages as intended by the precedent set by all other physical damage mods  (Comet Blast, Quasar Drill, Zodiac Shred, Meteor Crash, Nebula Bore, and Astral Slash are all +90%).

146676f5a68671d265a9c561dedd0d34.name: Fortuna: Hotfix 24.2.5
146676f5a68671d265a9c561dedd0d34.changes: Deadly Efficiency's Duration can now be refreshed if it is already active.

7f90fc80d5d9771f40dfe6579b225edd.name: Warframe: Archwing
7f90fc80d5d9771f40dfe6579b225edd.changes:
Sinister Reach: Rifle: Extend range on beam weapons.
Ruinous Extension: Pistol: Extend range on beam weapons.

7f90fc80d5d9771f40dfe6579b225edd.name: Update 13.3.0: Pack Hunters
7f90fc80d5d9771f40dfe6579b225edd.changes: Extended the maximum possible duration on Sound Quake's sound effects to take into account duration extending Mods.

7f90fc80d5d9771f40dfe6579b225edd.name: Hotfix 13.0.6+13.0.7+13.0.7.1
7f90fc80d5d9771f40dfe6579b225edd.fixes: Extended Specter variety to include all possible Warframes; Specters now manifest as the current Warframe being used by the clan member they represent.

0092a3e26c5a376e19d5f0896fa058d1.name: Plains of Eidolon: Hotfix 22.1.2
0092a3e26c5a376e19d5f0896fa058d1.fixes: Fixed chat-linking not working for the Kinetic Diversion, Target Acquired and Spring-Loaded Blade mods.

4a02e0bffb7e0194ecfef3ac92ff046e.name: Update 15.8.0
4a02e0bffb7e0194ecfef3ac92ff046e.fixes: 10 BATTLE POINTS: Eyes of Blight Mod Pack (Magma Chamber + Searing Steel)

e73645ca2819d467c20bddd1e9597c6e.additions: Meteor Crash, Nebula Bore, and Astral Slash have been added to the Codex.

6bf264519b612263e160b9c07168f75e.changes: •    Dregs and Lancer Dregs will now drop Morphic Transformer.

6bf264519b612263e160b9c07168f75e.fixes: Fixed Primed Morphic Transformer being equippable alongside Morphic transformer.

06460572b3d0d61410a8da714a3531dc.additions: Meteor Crash, Nebula Bore, and Astral Slash have been added to the Codex.

8dcb5796c9f9adfc5b37150d19406e42.fixes: Fixed Quick Reload and Sabot Rounds Mods having all caps description text.

8dcb5796c9f9adfc5b37150d19406e42.name: Update 15.9

f5cbd4d6fce35e71e62f749336e0dca9.fixes: Fixed the Codex not listing Shell Rush’s drop location.

9f3882fd480313c179edf4698d6c2cdb.changes: Changed the Venomous Clip Archwing Mod to reflect the same Cost and Drain of other elemental Mods for Archwing.
